mapper.sql: self.DEFAULT_CORP_ID, self.AFFILIATED_CORP_ID, self.RECV_CITY_ID, self.SEND_CITY_ID, self.IS_UNIVERSAL, self.CREATOR, self.CREATE_DATE, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, corpA.CORP_NAME as refAffiliatedCorpName, corpB.CORP_NAME as refCorpName, cityA.CITY_NAME as refRecvCityName, cityB.CITY_NAME as refSendCityName, user.USER_NAME as refCreatorName

where self.DEL = 0 and self.DEFAULT_CORP_ID = #{defaultCorpId} and self.AFFILIATED_CORP_ID = #{affiliatedCorpId} and self.RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId} and self.SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId} and self.IS_UNIVERSAL = #{isUniversal} and self.CREATOR = #{creator} and self.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and self.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and self.FLAG = #{flag} and (corpA.CORP_NAME = #{refAffiliatedCorpName} or corpA.CORP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{refAffiliatedCorpName}, '%')) and (cityA.CITY_NAME = #{refRecvCityName} or cityA.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{refRecvCityName}'%')) and (cityB.CITY_NAME = #{refSendCityName} or cityB.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{refSendCityName}'%')) and self.CREATE_DATE >= #{startDate} and self.CREATE_DATE <= #{endDate} and ( corpA.CORP_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or cityA.CITY_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or cityB.CITY_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') )
mapper.select: select from bd_default_transport_corp self left join sys_corp corpA on self.AFFILIATED_CORP_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_city cityA on self.RECV_CITY_ID = cityA.CITY_ID left join bd_city cityB on self.SEND_CITY_ID = cityB.CITY_ID left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID where self.DEFAULT_CORP_ID = #{defaultCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.update: update bd_default_transport_corp set DEL = 1 where DEFAULT_CORP_ID = #{defaultCorpId}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_default_transport_corp (AFFILIATED_CORP_ID, RECV_CITY_ID, SEND_CITY_ID, IS_UNIVERSAL, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{affiliatedCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isUniversal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bd_default_transport_corp AFFILIATED_CORP_ID, RECV_CITY_ID, SEND_CITY_ID, IS_UNIVERSAL, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{affiliatedCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isUniversal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update bd_default_transport_corp AFFILIATED_CORP_ID = #{affiliatedCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_UNIVERSAL = #{isUniversal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where DEFAULT_CORP_ID = #{defaultCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bd_default_transport_corp set AFFILIATED_CORP_ID = #{affiliatedCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECV_CITY_ID = #{recvCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SEND_CITY_ID = #{sendCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_UNIVERSAL = #{isUniversal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DEFAULT_CORP_ID = #{defaultCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from bd_default_transport_corp self left join sys_corp corpA on self.AFFILIATED_CORP_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_city cityA on self.RECV_CITY_ID = cityA.CITY_ID left join bd_city cityB on self.SEND_CITY_ID = cityB.CITY_ID left join bd_user user on self.CREATOR = user.USER_ID order by self.CREATE_DATE DESC

select self.TRANSFER_UNIT_ID as unitId, unitA.UNIT_CODE as unitCode, unitA.UNIT_TYPE as unitType, unitA.UNIT_NAME as unitName, unitA.ADDRESS as address, unitA.SUPEROR_CORP_ID as superorCorpId, unitB.UNIT_NAME as superorCorpName from bd_default_transport_corp_detail self left join bd_unit unitA on self.TRANSFER_UNIT_ID = unitA.UNIT_ID left join bd_unit unitB on unitA.SUPEROR_CORP_ID = unitB.UNIT_ID where self.DEFAULT_CORP_ID = #{defaultCorpId}
